sentences.simplifiedText: 这是一个好的投资机会。
sentences.traditionalText: 這是一個好的投資機會。
sentences.pinyin: zhè shì yīgè hǎo de tóuzī jīhuì.
sentences.translation: This is a good investment opportunity.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在未来几年，他计划将大部分收入投资在科技行业。
sentences.traditionalText: 在未來幾年，他計劃將大部分收入投資在科技行業。
sentences.pinyin: zài wèilái jǐ nián, tā jìhuà jiāng dà bùfen shōurù tóuzī zài kējì hángyè.
sentences.translation: In the next few years, he plans to invest most of his income in the technology industry.
